trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當 I/O 錯誤發生時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.IOException> is the base class for exceptions thrown while accessing information using streams, files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料流、檔案和目錄存取資訊時，<xref:System.IO.IOException> 是擲回之例外狀況的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The Base Class Library includes the following types, each of which is a derived class of `IOException` :
trans-unit.target: 基底類別庫還包括下列類型中，每一個都是在衍生的類別的`IOException`:

trans-unit.source: Where appropriate, use these types instead of IOException.
trans-unit.target: 適用時，使用這些類型，而不是 IOException。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.IOException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_IO which has the value 0x80131620.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.IOException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_IO 0x80131620 的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with its message string.
trans-unit.target: 使用其訊息字串，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with its message string set to the empty string (""), its HRESULT set to COR_E_IO, and its inner exception set to a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 使用其訊息字串設定為空字串 ("")、其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_IO 和其內部例外狀況設定為 Null 參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An I/O error occurred while performing the requested operation."
trans-unit.target: 建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 發生 I/O 錯誤發生時執行要求的作業 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 「訊息」<c></c>的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with its message string set to <paramref name="message" />, its HRESULT set to COR_E_IO, and its inner exception set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用其訊息字串設定為 <paramref name="message" />、其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_IO 和其內部例外狀況設定為 <see langword="null" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance using `message`.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體使用`message`。

trans-unit.source: The data for serializing or deserializing the object.
trans-unit.target: 用於序列化或還原序列化物件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination for the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化 (Serialization) 和內容資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.IO.IOException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on inner exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關內部例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 「訊息」<c></c>的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: An integer identifying the error that has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 識別所發生錯誤的整數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> class with its message string set to <paramref name="message" /> and its HRESULT user-defined.
trans-unit.target: 使用其訊息字串設定為 <paramref name="message" /> 和其使用者定義的 HRESULT，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
